Name: Mint & Honey Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: STIR honey and rum in base of shaker until honey dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: A fresh-breath-tastic riff on the classic Daiquiri.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly (Simon Difford).
